page.title: 17Sport in N/Hamm/Coll P
page.content: Football is the favourite sport in the area, probably because there is a football ground in Shepherds Bush.It is where Queens Park Rangers play.The pitch was grass but now it is made from astro-turf.The club were the first in England to have an artificial pitch.When the football season is over,the ground can hold other sporting events,such as boxing or hockey.The White City Stadium was also popular for sporting events, mainly running, greyhound racing and speedway. This has now been pulled down to build a supermarket. All school children play sport in school.This is usually footbal, hockey,tennis,cricket,rounders and netball.They all use the local swimming pool at various times during school hours. The Stadium on Wormwood Scrubs is used for local sporting events.
